import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiDroplet, FiPackage, FiCheckCircle, FiPlus, FiMinus } from 'react-icons/fi'; const BloodBankDashboard = () => { const [inventory, setInventory] = useState({ 'A+': 15, 'A-': 8, 'B+': 12, 'B-': 6, 'O+': 25, 'O-': 10, 'AB+': 7, 'AB-': 4 }); const [requests, setRequests] = useState([ { id: 1, patientName: 'John Smith', bloodGroup: 'A+', units: 2, urgency: 'critical', status: 'open', hospital: 'City General', contact: '555-0123' }, { id: 2, patientName: 'Sarah Johnson', bloodGroup: 'O-', units: 3, urgency: 'high', status: 'assigned', hospital: 'Memorial Hospital', contact: '555-0456' }, { id: 3, patientName: 'Mike Wilson', bloodGroup: 'B+', units: 1, urgency: 'medium', status: 'open', hospital: 'Queens Medical', contact: '555-0789' } ]); const bloodGroups = ['A+', 'A-', 'B+', 'B-', 'O+', 'O-', 'AB+', 'AB-']; const updateInventory = (bloodGroup, action) => { setInventory(prev => ({ ...prev, [bloodGroup]: action === 'increase' ? prev[bloodGroup] + 1 : Math.max(0, prev[bloodGroup] - 1) })); alert(`Inventory ${action === 'increase' ? 'increased' : 'decreased'} for ${bloodGroup}`); }; const acceptRequest = (requestId) => { setRequests(prev => prev.map(req => req.id === requestId ? { ...req, status: 'assigned' } : req )); alert('Request accepted successfully!'); }; const totalUnits = Object.values(inventory).reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); const criticalLow = bloodGroups.filter(bg => inventory[bg] < 5).length; return (
{/* Header */}

Blood Bank Dashboard

Manage your blood inventory and fulfill requests

{/* Stats */}

{criticalLow}

Pending Requests

{/* Inventory */}

Blood Inventory Management

{bloodGroups.map((group) => (

Blood Group

{group}

{inventory[group]}

units

))}

Total Blood Units

{totalUnits}

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/* Blood Requests */}

Blood Requests

{requests.length === 0 ? (

No blood requests at the moment.

) : (
{requests.map((request) => ( ))}
Patient Blood Units Urgency Hospital Status Action

{request.patientName}

{request.hospital}

 {request.bloodGroup} {request.units} {request.urgency}

{request.hospital}

 {request.status} {request.status === 'open' ? ( ) : ( Accepted )}
)}
); }; export default BloodBankDashboard;
